entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
